attributes.action: look at park benches supply and distribution - per capita or geographical ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please consider putting a park bench along Fearnhead Lane, Warrington, because my Mum and I, who are both unwell, need to rest en route between our house and the shops. It will also be very good for the people coming home from church n Sunday. This fits in with local Warrington - based consultations on health and social care initiatives.

Thank you.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
